Row.Text: Lyndis, Lady of the Wind, as a [ICON_GREATPERSON] Unique Hero. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Start game with this unit replacing the player's initial warrior. [NEWLINE]Scales with era but typically slightly weaker than the unit(s) of that era. [NEWLINE]Grants Combat Bonus to nearby units, similar to Great General. [NEWLINE]Upon death of a Hero, a shrine is constructed in the Capital, this shrine allows the training of another Hero in that city. No more than one instance of a specific Hero existing can belong to a Civilization at a time. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Does not enforce a Zone of Control. [NEWLINE]Conducting a ranged attack refunds 1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement and allows unit to move after attacking from range that turn. Cannot occur more than once per turn, does not allow another attack action. [NEWLINE]Sacae's 'Call of the Wind' Ability extends to Lyndis.
The legendary blade dropped by Lyndis when she fell in battle. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Her soul is permanently attached to the blade, perhaps she in another life will wield the blade again.
